author: max
name: RestrictPosts
install_msg:
Thanks for installing.
This cog relies on red's autoimmune, to ignore role(s) or user(s) use `[p]autoimmune` from red. You are not immune from any of the filter(s) without setting up autoimmune.
<https://cogs.maxapp.tv/> for documentation.
If you enjoy my work, you can donate at [buymeacoffee](<https://buymeacoffee.com/ltzmax>)
description: A cog to restrict posts to attachments and links in a specific channel(s).
short: A cog to restrict posts to attachments and links in a specific channel(s).
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
